properties.description: Jebel Irhoud, Morocco, is one of the oldest known sites where modern human fossils have been found, dating to around 300,000 years ago.
Herto, Ethiopia, is a Middle Awash site where Homo sapiens idaltu fossils were found, dating back to around 160,000 years ago.
Klasies River in South Africa is an important Middle Stone Age site with evidence of early modern humans living there around 125,000 years ago.
